issue.title: outlook.live.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://outlook.live.com/people/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.live.com%2Fpeople%2F) ### Comment Username: @t3chnob0y > There is a problem with the Adguard Annoyances Filter which blocks the creation/editing of a contact on Outlook.com. When clicking the New Contact or Edit buttons, it opens and closes immediately the window shown in the screenshot. > > The problem does not happen when the Adguard Annoyances Filter is disabled or if the following User rule is added : > > outlook.live.com#@$?#.ms-Layer:-abp-has(div.ms-Modal > div.ms-Dialog-main div[class] > button + button > span[data-automationid="splitbuttonprimary"]) { display: none !important;} ### Screenshots

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If youâ€™re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If youâ€™re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://outlook.live.com/people/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.live.com%2Fpeople%2F) ### Comment Username: @t3chnob0y > There is a problem with the Adguard Annoyances Filter which blocks the creation/editing of a contact on Outlook.com. When clicking the New Contact or Edit buttons, it opens and closes immediately the window shown in the screenshot. > > The problem does not happen when the Adguard Annoyances Filter is disabled or if the following User rule is added : > > outlook.live.com#@$?#.ms-Layer:-abp-has(div.ms-Modal > div.ms-Dialog-main div[class] > button + button > span[data-automationid="splitbuttonprimary"]) { display: none !important;} ### Screenshots

issue.title: https://kit.fontawesome.com/ bloqued
issue.body:
### Prerequisites
